name: RHAM_Policies
description: Online version of RHAM's Policy Manual

scripts.build: cross-var node scripts/updateVersion latest && tiddlywiki . --output docs/latest --build index
scripts.release: cross-var node scripts/updateVersion $npm_package_version && tiddlywiki . --output docs --build index && cross-var shx mkdir -p docs/$npm_package_version && cross-var shx cp docs/index.html docs/$npm_package_version/index.html

author: Scott Sauyet
